Cherrycake\Item::__get

Magic get method to return the Item's data corresponding to the specified $key If the key is for a database field that is language dependant as specified by $this->fields, the proper language data according to the current Locale language will be returned If the key is for a timezone dependant field as specified by $this->fields, the proper timezone adjusted timestamp will be returned according to the current Locale timezone

    Signature

    public function __get(string $key )

    Parameters

    $key — string
    The key of the data to get

    Returns

    mixed
    The data. Null if data with the given key is not set.
